Authors:
Yingming Li, Roger G Shivas, Alistair Ross McTaggart,
Kalman Vanky, Lei Cai
Title:
Anthracocystis linguoae sp. nov. on Schizachyrium delavayi
(Poaceae) from China
Abstract:
Anthracocystis linguoae sp. nov. is described from
infected inflorescences of Schizachyrium delavayi collected in China.
The new species is characterized by sori that infect localized part
spikelets of an inflorescence, with several filiform columellae,
subglobose to irregular spore balls, dark outer spores and light inner
spores. The new species was illustrated with light micrographs and
scanning electric Micrographs, compared with similar taxa and analysed
for phylogenetic relationships.
